item.title: K8s
This is the title
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person. — Mr. Robot S01E01

item.title: About
item.description: Insert info and resume here + links to twitter, linkedin, etc Hi there My name is Radek and I’m the author of this theme. I made it to help you present your ideas easier. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, configure them and when that’s done — create the content. This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials.

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person. — Mr. Robot S01E01
